results.content:
some of the points to improve
1) Instructor makes the 2) same statement again n again.
3) there was no need to stretch the videos, most of the videos can be finish in half the time.'
4) Content is not concise n clear.
5) Need to explain things better especially communication skills
6) Wasted a lot of time creating the duplicate resource , could have create at the first place.
7) First chapter should be replaced. Not up to the standard.

Additionally, it might be best to have separate videos for creating services using the GUI and the CLI.

results.content:
A detailed course on Cloud services and products on Microsoft azure. 18+ hours of content is what expected from a bootcamp, when taken seriously could make one an expert on azure.

Lots of Practical exercises and projects are there in this course most of them are multipurpose being applicable in different domains.
